name: Theurgy: Homeshard
description:
My entry for the Beak, Feather and Bone game jam.

This hack of the system is intended for use with Theurgy: Afterward, a game still in development. It can be used to create small to large fantasy settings with a variety of features. You play from the perspective of a Kedge, a spirit that had a hand in creation of this place and watches over it.
To play you need the following materials:

  • This document
  • Writing utensils
  • Note cards
  • A standard 52 card deck of playing cards
  • A token to indicate where the Storyteller Shrine is located
  • Tokens for each player to place on the map as they play cards

This is my first game jam entry, I would really appreciate feedback if you have any for me, thanks.
